Brock.Description: I spent my time treasure-hunting and had a bolstered-up lineup, resultantly... Want to see what I found?
Brock.Rewards: $5000-35000, 5x PP Up, 5x Rare Candy, 1-2x Stardust, 1x Star Piece, 1x Dome Fossil, 1x Helix Fossil, 1x Old Amber, 1x Nugget, 1x Big Nugget, 0-5x PVE Coins

Chuck.Description: Just look how strong I've gotten, lifting this 100kg barbell with ease!
Chuck.Rewards: $5000-35000, 5-10x Chople Berry, 5-10x Focus Sash, Shroomish, 5-10x Weakness Policy, 5-10 Lum Berry, 3-8x Rare Candy, 3-8x PP Up, Black Belt, Timburr, Mienfoo, Chimchar, 0-5x PVE Coins

Guardian Entei.Rewards: $25000-35000, 3x PP Up, 3x TM85 - Flamethrower, 3x TM61 - Sunny Day, Heat Rock, Choice Band, 5x PVE Coins, Entei (If you didn't catch it, level 30)
Guardian Entei.Third Rewards: Entei (If you didn't catch it, level 30), Charmander, Bulbasaur, Chimchar, Tepig

George.Description: One of my contacts from the outside managed to sneak my full team in for me...Don't ask. Want to test me at my full potential?
George.Rewards: $5000-35000, 2x Toxic Orb, 2x Flame Orb, Black Sludge, Houndour, Electrike, Lillipup, Riolu, Furfrou, 0-5x PVE Coins

Jessie & James.Description: Prepare for trouble, and make it double!
Jessie & James.Rewards: $5000-35000, Silver Disc, Wynaut, Frilish, Team Rocket Clothes, Foongus, Cacnea, Inkay, Sm Black Cap, Rocket Uniform, 3x PVE Coins

Erika.Description: I see you have grown stronger since our Gym battle, but so have I. Let me challenge you; I want to test how much both of us have improved!
Erika.Rewards: $5000-35000, 5-10x Rindo Berry, 5-10x Weakness Policy, Lotad, Tangela, 2-3x TM22 - Solarbeam, 5-10x Sitrus Berry, Ferroseed, Turtwig, Larvesta, 0-5x PVE Coins

Koichi.Description: Come at me with everything you have—IF you are ready, that is?
Koichi.Rewards: $5000-35000, 5-10x Chople Berry, 5-10x Focus Sash, Tyrogue, 5-10x Weakness Policy, 5-10x Lum Berry, 3-8x Rare Candy, 3-8 PP Up, Riolu, Pancham, Ralts, 0-5x PVE Coins

Naero.Description: After mindlessly grinding these Pokémon, I can put the perfect exclamation point on my task by deploying them to beat you!
Naero.Cooldown: 12 days, 6 days(First time loss if active ms)
Naero.Rewards: Unlock Daycare, $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Tyrogue, Cleffa, Igglybuff, Pichu, Munchlax, Bonsly, Mime Jr., Togepi, Elekid, Magby, Smoochum

Nikola.Description: I feel that you are in need of a rare Pokémon. But... Do you deserve it? Are you willing to attest your merit to me in a battle?
Nikola.Requirements: • Not able to catch a legendary anymore
Nikola.Rewards: Recatch a legendary, you can't catch anymore

Professor Oak.Description: Are you ready to show me what Pokémon you have been training?
Professor Oak.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Occa Berry, 5-10x Passho Berry, 5-10x Rindo Berry, 5-10x Haban Berry, 3-8x Rare Candy, 3-8x PP Up, Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle, Dratini, Rotom

Officer Shamac.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Focus Sash, 5-10x Weakness Policy, 3-8x Rare Candy, Dubious Disc, Lapras, Mudkip, Goomy, Minccino

Shary & Shaui.Description: Whats the MYSTERYYYY?!?!? I know: let's have a battle!
Shary & Shaui.Description2: REEEEEEE! I'm trying to make tacos over here. But I guess I'll battle you.
Requirements: • You can't leave the house before you beat Shary and Shaui
Shary & Shaui.Rewards: $10000-60000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 10-15x Focus Sash, 2-3x TM115 - Shadow Claw, 2-3x TM96 - Thief, 2-3x TM52 - Dragon Claw, 2-3x TM92 - Facade, 2-3x TM85 - Flamethrower, 2-3x TM80 - Shadow Ball, 2-3x TM54 - Calm Mind, 2-3x TM62 - Taunt, 5-8x Rare Candy, 5x Dark Gem, Goomy Hat, Lunch Box, Marill, Shinx, Trapinch, Pancham, Deino, Eevee, Purrloin, Audino
Shary & Shaui.Third Rewards: Eevee, Shinx, Deino, Audino, Trapinch, Buneary

The Pumpkin King.Description: Oh, so you think you're good; do ya'? Let's see if you can match up with the pumpkin king!!!
The Pumpkin King.Rewards: Unlock the berry shop in Goldenrod City, $5000-15000, 10x Passho Berry, 10x Rindo Berry, 10x Occa Berry, 10x Yache Berry, 10x Shuca Berry, 10x Chople Berry, 10x Colbur Berry, Shiny Stone, Shuckle, Lotad, Pawniard

Urahara.Description: A winner should always think, not of how the world is, but how it should be
Urahara.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Focus Sash, 25-35x Lum Berry, Choice Band, Choice Scarf, Life Orb, TZ Clothes, Hollow Mask, Riolu, Larvitar, Larvesta

Xylos.Description: You want to battle?! Don't even want to say hello first or so? Well, okay...
Xylos.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Jolteon, Flareon, Vaporeon, Leafeon, Glaceon, Umbreon, Sylveon, Eevee, 2-3x Thunder Stone, 2-3x Fire Stone, 2-3x Water Stone, 2-3x Leaf Stone, 3-5x Electric Gem, 3-5x Fire Gem, 3-5x Ice Gem, Ice Stone

Youngster Joey.Description: YES! Your Rattata is worthy! Now, let's see how it pales in comparison to my top-percentage-Rattata team!

Officer Jenny.Description: Hello **Player**! Things have been considerably improving here and the Pokémon are slowlh increasing in number again!
Officer Jenny.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coin, 1-3x Sun Stone, 1-3x Moon Stone, 1-3x Dawn Stone, 1-3x Shiny Stone, Electrizer, 3-5x Air Balloons, Magmarizer, 3-5x Rare Candies, Growlithe, Pidgey, Electrike, Shinx, Lillipup, Squirtle

Klohver.Description: These flowers are growing up so beautifully. Oh... you want to battle me
Klohver.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Pomeg Berry, 5-10x Kelpsy Berry, 5-10x Qualot Berry, 5-10x Grepa Berry, 5-10 Tamato Berry, 5-10x Rare Candy, Oddish, Petilil, Skiddo

PreHax.Description: Did you know that Munchlax is a combinaion of the word 'Munch' and 'Relax' as a reference to their eating and sleeping habits?
Requirements: • Must have only 2 Pokemon in team
PreHax.Rewards: $10000-20000, 2x Pomeg Berry, 2x Kelpsy Berry, 2x Qualot Berry, 2x Hondew Berry, 2x Grepa Berry, 2x Tamato Berry, Silk Scarf, Choice Specs, Leftovers, Eviolite

Cie.Description: Hey **Player**! My Diancie always wanted some more friends!
Cie.Location: Fluffles Wonderland (Giving 3 Rare Candies to Shiny Munchlax in Munlax Resort)
Cie.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 7-20x Max Repel, 2-8x Rare Candy, 3-10x Focus Sash, 4-13x Shuca Berry, Masterball, Cleffa, Maryll, Scyther, Togepi, Happiny, Staryu, Klefki

BattleBot.Description: Super Mega Hyper Ultra BattleBot Extended Beast Mode Edition 2.0 Remastered Dirctors Cut Initialising.
BattleBot.Rewards: $60,000-125,000, 10x Rare Candy, 10x Focus Sash, 50x Ultra Ball, 1x Assault Vest, 3x Weakness Policy, 1x Eviolite, 1x Master Ball, Dratini, Larvitar, Bagon, Beldum, Goomy, Gible, 25 % chance for Phione
BattleBot.Third Rewards: Dratini, Larvitar, Bagon, Beldum, Goomy, Gible, Small MS Medalion

Red.Rewards: You can use the subway now, if you completed the quest

Bruno.Description: I lost my motivation after you tore through my team, but I got it back through travelling through the Johto region. Battle me now, and I promise this battle won't be like the last.
Bruno.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Focus Sash, 1-3x TM26 - Earthquake, 3-8x Rare Candy, Meditite, Throw, Sawk, Scraggy

Bugsy.Description: It's been a while since you and I last fought.I remember that outcome well, and it has made me rethink what it means to be a bug trainer.
Bugsy.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Weakness Policy, Silver Powder, 1-3x TM139 - U-turn, 3-8x PP Up, Straw Hat, Straw Hat 2, Pinsir, Scyther, Ferroseed, Snivy

Professor Elm.Description: I'm stronger than I was before! Don't take me lightly!
Professor Elm.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Miracle Seed, Charcoal, Mystic Water, 3-8x Rare Candy, 3-8x PP Up, Chicorita, Cyndaquil, Totodile, Larvitar, Togepi

Lance - Dragons Den B1F.Cooldown: No cooldown, Not rechallengable after winning
Requirements: Talk to Security Guy in Cerulean City

Lance - Dragons Shrine.Description: This place is perfect for my Dragon-type Pokémon, isn't it? I see you have grown stronger. I have grown just as much by training in this sacred place. How about a little battle to see if you can catch up to my new found strength?
Lance - Dragons Shrine.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Weakness Policy, 3-8x Rare Candy, 5-10x Focus Sash, Axew, Swablu, Dratini, Skrelp

Lorelei.Description: Hey, **Player** long time no see. After you froze me out at the Elite Four, I had to find and train some more varied pokemon. I still love the Ice type but had to vary my approach a bit. Want to battle?
Lorelei.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-10x Yache Berry, 5-10x Focus Sash, Sneasel, Snover, Lapras, 5-10x Lum Berry, Winter Clothes and Hat Blu, Winter Clothes and Hat Green, Winter Clothes and Hat Grey, Winter Clothes and Hat Pink, Lapras Mount, Ice Stone

Misty.Description: I haven't seen you since our last battle in cerulean. I don't run the Gym anymore - it's now run by my sisters. I'm currently borrowing some of my friend's pokemon. I'm sure he won't mind me using them to beat you!
Misty.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 1-3x Pearl, Water Gem, 1-3x TM105 - Scald, 3-8x PP Up, Ludicolo Clothes, Ludicolo Hat, Wailmer, Shellder, Shellos, Oshawott

Neroli.Description: Oh! Hello **Player**! I see that Celebi has chosen you. Are you a special trainer? Well, let's battle!
Neroli.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Clefairy, Budew, Vulpix, Phanpy, Chikorita, Sewaddle, Petilil, Litwick, Flabebe, Goomy, Ralts, 3-5x Revival Herb, 3-10x Energy Root, 3-5x Focus Sash, 3-5x Leaf Stone, 3-5x Dusk Stone, 3-5x Rare Candy, Miracle Seed, 3-5x TM22 - Solarbeam, 3-5x TM61 - Sunny Day, Hibiscus Hat, Pansy Flower, Orchid Flowerm, Anemone Flowerm, Jasmine Flower

Gamers Pewdie & Diepy.Description: This Game Corner? No, it's not for public. Just ask the receptionist, he will say the same thing. And yes, I paid him to say that to visitors. Any problem?
Gamers Pewdie & Diepy.Rewards: $10000-60000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Clefairy, Natu, Swirlix, Munna, Azurill, Mime Jr., Beldum, Dedenne, Carbink, Togepi, Ralts, Solosis, 3-5x Revival Herb, 3-10x Energy Root, 3-8x Focus Sash, 3-5x Moon Stone, 3-8x Rare Candy, 3-5x Air Baloon, 1-2x Kings Rock, 3-5x TM29 - Psychic, 5-8x Moon Stone, 5-8x PP Up, 3-5x Leftovers
Gamers Pewdie & Diepy.Third Rewards: Beldum, Dedenne, Carbink, Togepi, Ralts, Solosis

Sage.Description: I have spent a very long time here, in solitude with my brothers. I have far surpassed them, both in spirit and in strength. Have you got what it takes?

Guardian Suicune.Rewards: $25000-35000, 5x PVE Coins, Suicune (If you didn't catch it level 30) 3-8x PP Up, 3x TM105 - Scald, 3x TM54 - Calm Mind, Icy Rock, Choice Specs
Guardian Suicune.Third Rewards: Suicune (If you didn't catch it, level 30), Snover, Spheal, Bergmite, Oshawott

Terminator.Description: T800: Based on your pupil dilation, skin temperature, and motor functions, I calculate a(n) [u]x-percent[/u] probability that you will hate having lost to me!
Terminator.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Klink, Magnemite, Elgyem, Grimer-Alolan, Solosis, Rotom, Porygon, 3-5x Revival Herb, 3-10x Energy Root, 3-5x Focus Sash, Dubious Disc, Upgrade, 3-5x Rare Candy, 3-5x TM24 - Thunderbolt, 3-5x TM53 - Psyshock

Thor.Description: Save the speech. I was sent here to guard this area, the legendary that exists here. You best be ready for me!
Thor.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Swinub, Clefairy, Larvitar, Teddiursa, Dratini, Froakie, Leftovers, 2-3x Rare Candy, 12-15x Sitrus Berry, Icy Rock, 3-8x Rare Candy, Heat Rock, Light Clay, Smooth Rock

Naruto Fanboy.Description: Art is something that blossoms for an instant before withering away
Naruto Fanboy.Rewards: $5000-35000, 3-5x Rare Candy, 2-3x Oran Berry, 3-5x Focus Sash, 2-3x Big Pearl, 1-3x Razor Claw, 1-3x Prism Scale, 3-5x TM26 - Earthquake, Slakoth, 3-5x TM130 - Return, Tynamo, Porygon, Cacnea, Whismur, Trapinch, Togepi

Professor Birch.Description: I haven't battled in a while, but would you mind?
Professor Birch.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coin, 3-8x Rare Candy, 3-8x Air Baloon, Poochyena, Tailow, Trapinch, Torchic, Mudkip, Treecko, Slakoth

Gingery Jones.Description: Hey **Player**! How can I help you?
Gingery Jones.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coin, Clauncher, Pancham, Klink, Golett, Timburr, Elgyem, Vullaby, Root Fossil, Claw Fossil, Old Amber, Skull Fossil, Dome Fossil, Helix Fossil, Armor Fossil, Jaw Fossil, Sail Fossil

Lt. Surge.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Pikachu, Electrike, Shinx, Elekid, Helioptile, Rotom, Tynamo, 3-5x Revival Herb, 3-10x Energy Root, 3-5x Focus Sash, 3-5x Sun Stone, 3-5x Thunder Stone, 3-5x Rare Candy, 3-5x TM24 - Thunderbolt, 3-5x TM60 - Hidden Power, Manectric Mount

Morty.Description: Oh hey **Player**. I felt empty at the end of our last battle. I needed sometime off. I heard about this place recently... it's perfect for some soul searching. I have become one with the Ghost type!
Morty.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 1-2x Spell Tag, 5-10x Focus Sash, 1-3x TM80 - Shadow Ball, 3-8x PP Up, 3-8x Rare Candy, Frillish, Sableye, Golett, Phantump, Pumpkaboo, Rotom

Guardian Raikou.Rewards: $25000-35000, 5x PVE Coins, Raikou (If you didn't catch it, level 30), 3-8x PP Up, 3x TM24 - Thunderbolt, 3x TM68 - Rain Dance, Damp Rock, Choice Scarf
Guardian Raikou.Third Rewards: Raikou (If you didn't catch it, level 30), Lotad, Electrike, Tynamo, Blitzle

Steven.Description: My Steel Pokémon will smash you into the ground!
Steven.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Aaron, Skarmory, Shieldon, Pawniard, Mawile, Beldum, Drilbur, Klefki, Riolu, 3-5x Revival Herb, 2-10x Electric Gem, 3-10x Focus Sash, 3-10x Rare Candy, 7-10x Passho Berry, Ice Stone

Toothless.Description: Dangerous people could be lurking around here... Did you get lost, kid?!
Toothless.Rewards: $5000-35000, Miltank, Staryu, Wooper, Feebas, Sableye, Beldum, Gible, 1-2x PP Max, 1-6x Rare Candy, TM115 - Shadow Claw, TM105 - Scald, TM80 - Shadow Ball

Tigerous.Description: What's up? You came here to chill? Okay let's have a look at the eye of the tiger before you check on the dude searchings his books
Tigerous.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 4-6x Rare Candy, 15-20x Focus Sash, Starly, Klefki, Relicanth, Rotom

Sinnoh.Description: Reshiram and Zekrom has chosen us... This is our Destiny.

Medusa & Eldir.Description: Reshiram and Zekrom has chosen us... This is our Destiny
Medusa & Eldir.Description2: I see you've proven yourself to be worthy opponent... but can you do it again!
Medusa & Eldir.Rewards: $10000-60000, 0-5x PVE Coins, DC Clothes, Peach Kimono, Purple Kimono, Green Kimono, Blue Kimono, Vulpix-Alolan, Grimer-Alolan, Mini MS Medalion, 20-30x Ultra Ball, 13-18x Lum Berry, 3-7x Rare Candy, 5-10x Super Repel

Ash Westbrook.Description: I, Ash Westbrook, shall use my God power on my team to battle you!
Ash Westbrook.Rewards: $10000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coin, 5-10x Rare Candy, Shed Shell, 10-20x Hyper Potion, 20-30x Ultra Ball, 3-8x Air Balloon, 3x Weakness Policy, Vullaby, Emolga, Tympole, Chespin

Letrix.Description: That was easy! That was a little taste from my shoe.
Letrix.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Magikarp, Wailmer, Togepi, Solosis, Drilbur, 7-20x Max Repel, 2-8x Rare Candy, 3-10x Focus Sash, 4-13x Chople Berry, 2-3x TM62 - Taunt

Link.Description: Oh, come on **Player** I've explained this to you already!!!
Link.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coin, 3-5x Revival Herb, 3-5x Focus Sash, 3-10x Energy Roots, 3-5x Rare Candy, 3-5x TM13 - Ice Beam, 3-5x TM75 - Swords Dance, 3-5x TM67 - Protect, Tingle Clothes, Tingle Headgear, Voltorb, Ponyta, Hitmontop, Bronzor, Phanpy, Skarmory, Absol, Tepig, Honedge

Maribela.Description: Ah, I see you're back again.
Maribela.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coin, 3-5x Rare Candy, 3-5x PP Up, 3-5x Focus Sash, Fennekin, 5x Pomeg Berry, 5x Kelpsy Berry, 5x Qualot Berry, 5x Hondew Berry, 5x Grepa Berry, 5x Tomato Berry, Growlithe, Budew, Frillish, Eevee, Larvesta, Blue Punk Jacket if male, Silver Diva Dress if female
Maribela.Third Rewards: Fennekin, Ralts, Frillish, Eevee, Larvesta, Fennekin

Professor Rowan.Description: Let's see if you are as experienced as you think!
Professor Rowan.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Starly, Shinx, Bronxor, Buneary, Gligar, Piplup, Chimchar, Turtwig, 3-5x Revival Herb, 2-10x Weakness Policy, 3-10x Focus Sash, 3-10x Rare Candy, 5-10x Ultra Ball, Master Ball

Saphirr.Description: You better be careful or my Pokémon will burn you!
Saphirr.Rewards: $5000-40000, 0-5x PVE Coins, Vulpix, Darumaka, Growlithe, Larvesta, Fletchling, Charmander, Cyndaquil, Torchic, 3-5x Revival Herb, 2-10x Fire Gem, 3-10x Focus Sash, 3-10x Rare Candy, 7-10x Yache Berry, 1-2x Fire Stone

Spectify.Description: Hey **Player**! How can I help you?
Spectify.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coin, 1-5x Rare Candy, 10x Revival Herb, 1-3x Big Pearl, 10-15x Ultra Ball, 1-2x Nugget, Masterball, Evee, Totodile, Cyndaquil, Chikorita, Bagon

Logan.Description: I am the best there is at what i do and what I do best isn't very nice. I'm Wolverine!
Logan.Rewards: $5000-35000, 0-5x PVE Coins, 5-20x Focus Sash, 25x Tamato Berry, 2x Life Orb, Logan Mask
